sakai:title: Users, Groups
sakai:shortDescription: Get the profiles of select users and groups.
sakai:parameters: {"name" : "q", "description" : "The substring you want to match against people's names and group titles."}
{"name" : "sortOn", "description" : "The name of the property you wish to sort on. This only has any affect if it is used with the sortOrder parameter. The default is score"}
{"name" : "sortOrder", "description" : "The order you wish to sort in. Either 'asc' or 'desc'."}
sakai:description: Get the profiles of users and groups whose names include the provided query term.
